content.raw: changed

The URI schema for physics is already defined, and it has the pattern `element_type/element_name`:

`data://world/world_name/model/model_name/....`

I feel like we should stick to that pattern here. But the GUI doesn't really have a name. I don't have a good suggestion, but we could go with:

`data://gui/gzclient/plugin/plugin_name`

What do you think?
content.html:
The URI schema for physics is already defined, and it has the pattern element_type/element_name:

data://world/world_name/model/model_name/....

I feel like we should stick to that pattern here. But the GUI doesn't really have a name. I don't have a good suggestion, but we could go with:

data://gui/gzclient/plugin/plugin_name

What do you think?

`ignition::msgs::Set(visualMsg->mutable_pose(), visual->GetPose());`

I'm looking into the geometry case, might need to add that to ign-msgs
content.html:
For custom messages, we need to use helper functions to set the values. To set pose for example, use this:

ignition::msgs::Set(visualMsg->mutable_pose(), visual->GetPose());

I'm looking into the geometry case, might need to add that to ign-msgs
